dcterms:creator: F. Rauscher
S. Nann
O. Sawodny
dcterms:description: IMU measurements used for estimating the state of an overhead crane, particularly focusing on the motion control of the crane with a wireless IMU mounted on the hook.
dcterms:title: IMU measurements for crane state estimation

dcterms:creator: R. Hartley
M. Ghaffari
R. M. Eustice
J. W. Grizzle
dcterms:description: IMU measurements utilized for state estimation of robotic arms, focusing on contact-aided invariant extended Kalman filtering.
dcterms:title: IMU measurements for robotic arm state estimation

dcterms:creator: A. Barrau
S. Bonnabel
dcterms:description: Theoretical framework related to navigation problems, providing insights into the geometry of two-frames theory.
dcterms:title: Two-frames theory

dcterms:creator: D. Simon
T. L. Chia
dcterms:description: Kalman filtering techniques that incorporate state equality constraints, enhancing the filtering process in systems with such constraints.
dcterms:title: Kalman filtering with state equality constraints
